Text:
I think this pack and the All Carenado Aircraft pack are my all time favourite FS9 Aircraft add ons.  Beautiful packages, I just wish this one was seeded, even though I already purchased it, so everyone else could see the beauty and craftsmanship of the PMDG products.

If raf-aldergrove does get all these recent torrents seeded it is a very generous contribution indeed.

Is this for FS2004 ..?
Does "enable button" work for Windows Vista?
how can I download this file? where is the button?

heres how it "REALLY" works...1) run the installer for either of the product, 2)get to the validation page,3)enter a pseudo email, a pseudo order ID (all numbers no strings!), a psuedo password,4) hit "validate", an error window will pop up, open the crack folder to run "enablebutton.exe" (with administrator rights, if ure on vista!!),get back to the error window and "ok" it, hit next, 5)after finishing the installation, just run the flight simulator......====WARNING==== U DONT NEED TO USE THE REGISTRY ENTRY SUPPLIED WITH THIS DOWNLOAD!!!!

PEACE

Open aircraft.cfg with notepad or world pad better :) then copy the lkines where are theese supouse to by in the aircraft.cfg and click on cross to exit and it will say save changes or no press yes :) that is it :)

Ok guys this is really how you install it

1. Open the installer (with vista run as administrator)

2. Go to the page where you have to add serial and stuff , you can just write random things like 123456789.

3. Then once you have filled in the spaces open crack folder and run the crack  (for vista run as administrator)

Then once you have done that the next button should appear, if it does click it then go on with installation and it should work fine.

yours truly    

Shpami

I followed all the steps and installed correctly and entered the code to the aircraft file but my screens are still turning black about after a minute...

Any help is appreciated!

Thanks

Try this to overcome the problem with the MFD's going blank with FS9.. open regedit and look for:
HKEY-LOCAL_MACHINE/Softwear/Microsoft USB Host/Din Controler/cssb2v6
I had 2 cssb2v6 folders with but only one had the data c2e80520102f0800e790160704de90760a1b3801
deleating the one without seems to have cured the problem...

Any one still having problems with the blank PFD screens?  I have 64 bit windows 7 and discovered that the registry has cssb2v6 and lv994r2 located in TWO different locations in the registry. So the c2e80520102f0800e790160704de90760a1b3801
 value has to be entered FOUR times in the registry.  This fixes the problem completely!
regards guys.
